title: All Adobe Updates
alt: ALERT: Some pending mandatory software updates require version 21.1.2 of the Oracle/Sun Java(tm) JDK(tm) Update Manager Runtime Environment Meta-Updater, which is not available for your platform.
transcript:
[Cueball is sitting at a laptop with a window with a red title bar floating over his head.]
Adobe Update
There is an update for:
Adobe Download Manager
This update will allow you to download the new updates to the Adobe Update Downloader.
[OK] [Download]
